backend/main.mo: Chat backend actor handling users, messages, media, emojis, and authorization using maps and storage mixins with join and profile update logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a favicon replacement feature, its components, and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files and their recent UI, color, and behavior updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with title and links to generated favicon assets and main script root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing user session, join flow, profile updates, and theme provider setup.
frontend/src/components/ChatScreen.tsx: Full chat interface handling messages, media uploads, emoji/GIF pickers, profile editing, and real‑time updates.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Emoji picker allowing browsing and uploading emoji images with validation and live preview.
frontend/src/components/GifPicker.tsx: GIF picker component that loads trending GIFs, supports searching via Giphy API, and lets users select a GIF.
frontend/src/components/JoinScreen.tsx: User onboarding form handling username input, optional profile picture upload, and user creation with error handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageItem.tsx: Displays a chat message with avatar, timestamp, text, emojis, and media, adjusting layout for own vs. others’ messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for messages, media uploads, sending messages, profiles, emojis, and default pictures using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and sets a light theme using OKLCH variables plus the Fredoka One font.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports app config for GIPHY API usage including key, endpoints, and default query params.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors from CSS variables, plugins, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, favicon updates, and pending requests for the Dini GC project.
